CustomField.description: Formula field that is used in email templates to the AE and Sales Engineer to display the value of the Catalog Change checkbox field.
CustomField.formula: IF( Catalog_Change__c , "A Catalog Change is required. You will be updated within 48 hours.", ".")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: System Maintained Field: Used in email templates to indicate whether the Catalog Change checkbox field is checked or not.
CustomField.label: Catalog Change Required Verbiage AE SE
